description: PDBs excluded from Stage 3 validation due to modified nucleotide edge cases (excludes Stage 2 failures)

a23_rmsd_fallback.reason: A23 (2'-deoxy-2'-fluoroadenosine) uses pyrimidine RMSD fallback in some structures but not others, causing dNN mismatch

epe_modified_cytosine.reason: EPE (modified cytosine) has minor dNN differences (~0.2Ã…)

j48_modified_nucleotide.reason: J48 is a highly modified nucleotide not in baselist.dat

nmn_nnr_nicotinamide.reason: NMN/NNR (nicotinamide nucleotides) not handled as bases

other_modified_nucleotides.reason: Various modified nucleotides causing dNN/pair differences
